name: 林懷恩
objective:
先修課程：負責教授同意。鍍膜製程為近代製造業廣泛利用之表面處理技術，常用於刀具、模具、光學元件、感測器及半導體裝置等。本課程提供物理、化學法鍍膜技術之原理、設備之介紹。並講述膜成核、生長理論與近代薄膜科技於能源、光電、生醫與環境領域之應用。
Film deposition process, a surface treatment technology, has been widely used in modern manufacturing. It is commonly applied in the development of cutters, molds, optical component, sensor and semiconductor devices, etc. This course provides an introduction regarding the basic principle and apparatus of the coating technology (physical and chemical routes). Besides, the film nucleation, growth theory and their applications in energy, optoelectronic, biomedical and environmental fields are described as well.
schedule:
Week 1　　課程內容簡介 Introduction of the subject
Week 2　　材料科學回顧 Materials Science Review
Week 3　　物理氣相沉積 Physical vapor deposition (Principle & apparatus of sputtering & thermal evaporative deposition)
Week 4　　化學氣相沉積 Chemical vapor deposition (Principle & apparatus)
Week 5　　電鍍、陽極處理、廢水處理 (Electroplating, anodizing & wastewater treatment)
Week 6　　例假日 Holiday
Week 7　　溼式化學法製程 Wet-chemical process (Spin-coating & spray pyrolysis)
Week 8　　溼式化學法製程 Wet-chemical process (Chemical bath deposition & electroless deposition)
Week 9　　期中考Middle examination
Week 10　　薄膜特性 (機械性質、光電特性) Thin film characteristic (Mechanical properties & optoelectronic properties)
Week 11　　薄膜分析 (材料性質) Thin film analyses (Materials properties)
Week 12　　薄膜成核與生長理論, 微結構與磊晶
Week 13　　薄膜應用(能源材料) Thin film applications (Energy materials)
Week 14　　薄膜應用(光電元件) Thin film applications (Optoelectronics)
Week 15　　薄膜應用(生醫與環境) Thin film applications (biomedical and environmental sciences)
Week 16　　期末報告 (Final report)
Week 17　　期末報告 (Final report)
Week 18　　Final exam 期末考
scorePolicy:
1.　　Participation 出席成績 (10%)
2.　　Assignment & presentation 作業與發表 (30%)
3.　　Middle examination 期中考 (30%)
4.　　Final examination 期末考 (30%)
materials:

2.　　The Materials Science of Thin Films, M. Ohring, Academic Press (1991).
